data.control_mode_home_assistant: [BETA] HomeAssistant Heating Thermostat. The thermostat will continously set 'luxtronik.target_correction' based on (T_thermostat - T_room). So if the (T_room < T_Thermostat), it will set a higher target temperature for the Heatpump to reduce the difference. Define the sensor to use for T_room in the next field.
